<title level="1" right="Rules">[Rune Formulas](/Rules.aspx?ID=3164)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 225 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The Price of a rune’s formula is the same as the Price of a [formula](/Rules.aspx?ID=2214) for an item of the same level; it can be acquired in the same way as an item formula.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
